1.title: Episode 1
1.caption: Five friends whose friendship goes back to their days in med school are brought back together when a phone call interrupts each of their busy lives.

2.title: Episode 2
2.caption: For the first time in 20 years, everyone's finally working under the same roof. A patient with a familiar name finds Chae Song-hwa.

3.title: Episode 3
3.caption: The hospital's med students are inspired by the doctors, who each look after their patients in their own ways. Lee Ik-jun gets a welcome visitor.
